sourcesContent:
export const HOTELS = [
  { id: 'h1', name: 'Taj Mahal Palace', location: 'Mumbai, India', price: 15000, rating: 4.8, img: 'E:/Travel-Booking/travel-booking-app/picture/1.jpg', description: 'Iconic luxury hotel in Mumbai.' },
  { id: 'h2', name: 'The Oberoi', location: 'New Delhi, India', price: 14000, rating: 4.7, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?the+oberoi,new+delhi,hotel', description: 'Elegant hotel near business district.' },
  { id: 'h3', name: 'ITC Grand Chola', location: 'Chennai, India', price: 12000, rating: 4.6, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?itc+grand+chola,chennai,hotel', description: 'Palatial hotel with premium amenities.' },
  { id: 'h4', name: 'The Leela Palace', location: 'Bengaluru, India', price: 11000, rating: 4.6, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?the+leela,bengaluru,hotel', description: 'Luxury stay with urban convenience.' },
  { id: 'h5', name: 'JW Marriott', location: 'Kochi, India', price: 9000, rating: 4.4, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?jw+marriott,kochi,hotel', description: 'Comfortable business & leisure hotel.' },
  { id: 'h6', name: 'The Park', location: 'Hyderabad, India', price: 8000, rating: 4.3, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?the+park,hyderabad,hotel', description: 'Stylish hotel with modern amenities.' },
  { id: 'h7', name: 'Radisson Blu', location: 'Pune, India', price: 7000, rating: 4.2, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?radisson,pune,hotel', description: 'Reliable upscale hotel in Pune.' },
  { id: 'h8', name: 'The Lalit', location: 'Kolkata, India', price: 6500, rating: 4.1, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?the+lalit,kolkata,hotel', description: 'Luxurious comfort in the city.' },
  { id: 'h9', name: 'Fortune Park', location: 'Ahmedabad, India', price: 5000, rating: 4.0, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?fortune+park,ahmedabad,hotel', description: 'Good value hotel for travelers.' },
  { id: 'h10', name: 'Hotel Clarks Shiraz', location: 'Agra, India', price: 4500, rating: 4.0, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?clarks+shiraz,agra,hotel', description: 'Near the Taj Mahal for tourists.' },
  // 11 additional hotels; 5 located in Tamil Nadu with prices between ₹5,000 - ₹6,500
  { id: 'h11', name: 'Hotel Breeze', location: 'Chennai, Tamil Nadu', price: 6200, rating: 4.2, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?chennai,hotel,beach', description: 'Comfortable stay close to the marina.' },
  { id: 'h12', name: 'Coimbatore Central', location: 'Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu', price: 5400, rating: 4.0, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?coimbatore,hotel', description: 'Business-friendly hotel with great connectivity.' },
  { id: 'h13', name: 'Madurai Heritage Hotel', location: 'Madurai, Tamil Nadu', price: 5000, rating: 4.1, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?madurai,heritage,hotel', description: 'Close to temples and local markets.' },
  { id: 'h14', name: 'Ooty Hills Resort', location: 'Ooty, Tamil Nadu', price: 6500, rating: 4.3, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?ooty,hills,resort', description: 'Hill resort with valley views.' },
  { id: 'h15', name: 'Kodaikanal View Inn', location: 'Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu', price: 5800, rating: 4.2, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?kodaikanal,hotel,lake', description: 'Scenic stay with lake access.' },
  // 6 more hotels across India
  { id: 'h16', name: 'Ginger Hotel', location: 'Bhubaneswar, India', price: 4800, rating: 3.9, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?bhubaneswar,hotel', description: 'Affordable, clean and convenient.' },
  { id: 'h17', name: 'The Gateway', location: 'Visakhapatnam, India', price: 7200, rating: 4.2, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?visakhapatnam,sea,hotel', description: 'Sea-facing hotel with modern amenities.' },
  { id: 'h18', name: 'Hotel Marina', location: 'Puducherry, India', price: 5600, rating: 4.0, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?pondicherry,puducherry,hotel', description: 'Coastal stay with French Quarter nearby.' },
  { id: 'h19', name: 'Silver Springs', location: 'Lucknow, India', price: 5300, rating: 4.0, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?lucknow,hotel', description: 'Comfortable hotel in the heart of the city.' },
  { id: 'h20', name: 'Grand Pine', location: 'Dehradun, India', price: 6700, rating: 4.3, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?dehradun,hills,hotel', description: 'Hillside hotel with nature views.' },
  { id: 'h21', name: 'Desert Pearl', location: 'Jaisalmer, India', price: 7500, rating: 4.4, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x360/?jaisalmer,desert,hotel', description: 'Unique desert stay near the forts.' }
];
